member.name: T:Eco.Web.Core.DataTransferObjects.IWebNotifiable
member.summary: Extension interface for adding web notification payload support for packaging the DTO object into a outgoing notification over WebSocket, Twitch PubSub, ect. This interface is primaryl used by the Twitch ServerDataRegistry to inform connected Twitch Extension clients that the data has changed and they need to refresh.
member.remarks: For more information about this object works. Refer to the documentation found at "Platforms/Twitch/TwitchExtension.md"

member.name: M:Eco.Web.Core.DataTransferObjects.IWebNotifiable.SupportsNotifications
member.summary: Checks if this instance supports notifications.
member.returns: True if the instance supports notifications.

member.name: M:Eco.Web.Core.DataTransferObjects.IWebNotifiable.GetNotificationPayload
member.summary: Retrieves the web notification payload in Newtonsoft form.

member.summary: Retrieves statistics information by name using specified start and end real life days to limit the returning data

Day to start the retrieval range at
Day to end the retrieval range at
